def fact (a):
    if a==0:
        return 1
    else:
        return a*fact(a-1)

def f( b):
    sum=0
    sum1=0
    for i in range(b):
        sum=sum+ fact(b-1)/(fact(i)*fact(b-i-1))
        sum1=sum1+i+1
    return sum1*sum

t=int(raw_input())
while(t):
    sum2=0
    n=int(raw_input())
    if(n<=22):

        for x in range(1,n+1):
         sum2=sum2+f(x)

        print sum2%8388608
    else :
        print 8388607
    t=t-1
